thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Evelyn

author: Evelyn
title: Evelyn
text:
1 Comprehensive Variety
2 Promptness in delivery even when my requested book was not in stock. Went on notify list and was notified very soon that one had come in.
3 Very reasonably priced
4 Love how I have the option to pick the condition of the product I want.
5 Have purchased many books with Thrift and only once received the wrong condition. Called customer service and the issue was totally resolved quickly.
6 Would totally recommend to anyone.
